channel.title: Learn Greek Vocabulary
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn Greek vocabulary with Language Addicts
channel.itunes:author: Language Addicts Ltd
channel.itunes:summary: Learn modern Greek vocabulary fast using Language addicts unique familiarise, recognise, memorise method. Regular three part podcasts will help you learn Greek vocabulary in categorised manageable chunks.
channel.description: A regular podcast designed to help you learn modern Greek vocabulary!

item.title: 33.1 - Conjunctions - Familiarise
item.itunes:author: Language Addicts
item.itunes:subtitle: The familiarise stage of Conjunctions
item.itunes:summary: Part 1, the familiarise stage of our 3 part podcast on Conjunctions. Put this stage on repeat until you feel familiar with the words you are learing. Try repeating the Greek word after the slowed down version of the Greek. If you think you could recognise these words if you heard them spoken, it's time to move on to podcast 33.2 and test your recognition of these words!
item.itunes:keywords: greek, vocabulary, learn, course, language, vocab builder, vocab, languageaddicts, language addicts, Conjunctions

item.title: 33.2 - Conjunctions - Recognise
item.itunes:author: Language Addicts
item.itunes:subtitle: The recognise stage of Conjunctions
item.itunes:summary: Part 2, the recognise stage of our 3 part podcast on Conjunctions. Put this stage on repeat until you feel familiar with the words you are learing. If you think you could recognise these words if you heard them spoken, it's time to move on to podcast 33.3 and test your memory of these words!
item.itunes:keywords: greek, vocabulary, learn, course, language, vocab builder, vocab, languageaddicts, language addicts, Conjunctions

item.title: 33.3 - Conjunctions - Memorise
item.itunes:author: Language Addicts
item.itunes:subtitle: The memorise stage of Conjunctions
item.itunes:summary: Part 3, the memorise stage of our 3 part podcast on Conjunctions. Put this stage on repeat until you can translate all the English words into Greek before they are given, then stay tuned for podcast 34.1, the first of our next set of podcasts coming soon!
item.itunes:keywords: greek, vocabulary, learn, course, language, vocab builder, vocab, languageaddicts, language addicts, Conjunctions
